name: Unity forum - Lighter
description:
A light skin for unity forums with sticky controls 
Controls are only sticky if the screen is wide enough.
additional_info:
Adapted some css from @orb on the forums.

Use this code in your signature so people without the theme will see a separator.

<div class="dark-theme-hide">______________________________________________________________________________</div>

This class will be automatically hidden with this theme and others.
